alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Oneida, southwestern Otsego, Broome, Madison, west central Delaware, southeastern Cortland, Chenango and northeastern Susquehanna Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1230 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Verona Beach to near Brackney. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Rome, Johnson City, Oneida, Kirkland, Lenox, Norwich, Verona, Westmoreland and Kirkwood. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 32 and 34. New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 7. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 71 and 84. Interstate 88 between 1 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
